name: River Racer
description:
Use up and down arrows to avoid rocks and collect ships. Try to stay alive as long as possible, to improve your score.

The game was create with Phaser.js, based on the boilerplate  https://github.com/lean/phaser-es6-webpack (I recommend it).

The idea appeared during Global Game Jam 2018, which had the theme "Transmission". When you touch another ship, you "transmit" the control and continue playing.

If you are in a public area, you may want to decrease the sound volume before starting the game, because it contains music and crash sounds.
